name: DeFiScale
description: DeFiScale is a blockchain-based project offering staking coins, including USDT and our own token – DFC – for a definite period of time. Our customers receive daily rewards paid out in DFC. The investment pool of DefiScale is used to initiate or join crypto projects to generate profits for founders, investors, staking clients and affiliates. We are an innovation in the industry of decentralized finances. Our strength is in our portfolio – well-diversified, stable and safe. Focused on trusted and profitable gambling and financial projects identified and verified by our experts with vast experience in financial and capital markets.
